page.title: 02Where people holidayed.
page.content: We asked 32 family groups,or individuals where they had taken,or would be taking,their Summer Holiday in 1985.This is what we discovered: Greece:2. Portugal:1. Switzerland:2. Scandinavia(mainly Sweden.):3. Northern France(motoring holiday):2. United States/Canada:1. Brasil/Colombia:1. Scotland:4(3 of which were motoring holidays). Wales:2. Eire:1. Lake District of England:4. East Coast(both Norfolk):2. Elsewhere in England:1. Six family groups would not be taking holidays in 1985.Of those that were,4 would also take Winter Holidays.
